name: jellyfin
tagline: A self-hosted media server for streaming movies shows and music
description: Jellyfin is a free, open source media server that organizes and streams movies, shows and music to many devices. It offers multi user libraries, live TV, hardware transcoding and a wide ecosystem of clients, all fully self hosted.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Movies, TV shows, music, Live TV support. Complete media center

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: User profiles, Parental controls, Watch history. Family-friendly

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Web, mobile, TV apps, Desktop clients. Every platform covered

features.title: Library Management
features.description: Automatic metadata, Artwork fetching, Organization tools. Beautiful libraries

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend features, Community add-ons, Custom integrations. Endless customization

features.title: Sync
features.description: Offline downloads, Mobile sync, Resume playback. Watch on the go
